author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Art Financial Expects Substantial Increase In Consolidated Profit For FY
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - China Art Financial Holdings Ltd :
* ‍EXPECTED THAT GROUP WILL RECORD A SUBSTANTIAL INCREASE IN CONSOLIDATED PROFIT FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO ‍SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN REVENUE FROM ART AUCTION BUSINESS​
* ‍EXPECTED FY PROFIT AND TOTAL COMPREHENSIVE INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE WILL RECORD NOT LESS THAN 50% INCREASE AS COMPARED TO LAST YEAR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
